title: Flipkart is not shipping pixel 4a to any pincodes in india, but delivering to assam.
content:
Why pixel 4a is not available to every customer?
It's exclusively launched in flipkart on 16th, after couple of minutes in the midnight it got sold, so they notified as coming soon,
One day later we got notification as it's available, but for hlle sake it's not available to any pincodes including metro cities like Bangalore, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Delhi, Chennai and Cochin,
But Shipping is available for All Assam pincodes.

Why? How can a seller can sell a exclusively launched product in only one State?
Do you think that only Assam people needs Google device?
Or Other state people aren't capable to purchase the device?

And they are shipping every other products to all over india, but not pixel 4a!
If they can't distribute or sell an exclusively launched product to all over india, then what's the point on launching a product in a country like india? That even a product that didn't even reached to the retailer market.

For more information, check #pixel4a hash tag on Twitter.

Google, kindly fix this, we were waiting for pixel 4a from August itself, 
Let us enjoy the device soon.
